Title: Relates to notices of violation of the city of New York's solid waste recycling laws
Summary: Relates to notices of violation of the city of New York's solid waste recycling laws; requires a photograph of the alleged violation to be mailed with the ticket.
LawCode: Amd ยง16-324, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enforcement
